greetings: Hello! My name is Hanh-Thao Luu (Thao).
overviewOfMe:
I live in Seattle WA.
Currently, I am enrolling at Code Fellows to master programming.
My career goal is to become a software-developer.
I am a self-motivated, persistent and diligent person.
I like to think creatively to make the impossible possible.
My goals in life are to be an excellent software developer,
a loving and supportive mother of two wonderful kids,
and a responsible citizen contributing to make life better for the humankind
and to preserve Earth.
